comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Mrs. Nelle Brooke Stull was founder and president of the Widows' and Widowers' Club, which introduced bereaved men and women to each other in hope of making new matches. "I am the love fixer. I make men and women happy. My theory is that every Jill has her Jack," said Stull. (Time Magazine, 12 November 1934) www.time.com/time/magazine/article/0,9171,748117,00.html?...

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an entry in Wikipedia for her: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nelle_Brooke_Stull

comment._content: She has a rather infectious smile :)
